'''''Dobharcu, Lord of the Hidden''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player must defeat the [[Local Legend]] {{Enemy|Blubberbeast Local Legend|text=Dobharcu, Lord of the Hidden &mdash; Legendary Repeller of the Great Seahorse, Defender of Countless Blubberbeasts|link=Blubberbeast}}.

==Gameplay Notes==
* Dobharcu, Lord of the Hidden can be found at the west of [[Chemin de L'Espoir]].
<gallery>
Achievement Dobharcu, Lord of the Hidden Location.png|Map Location
Achievement Dobharcu, Lord of the Hidden Location Context.png|Location Context
</gallery>

==Trivia==
* In Irish folklore, {{w|Dobhar-chú}} or King Otter is a creature that resembles both a dog and an otter, but sometimes it is described as half dog, half fish.
